entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then light snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches developing in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
